attributes.additional_details: Every year the British Government send Millions to the Scotish government yet they do not say what its spent on. Schools have been let down they are the poorest performers in the UK. Drug Deaths are up they do nothing. money for covid recovery for bussinesses was not allocated to Scotish companies. Money has gone missing and it shows Scotland have a corrupt government. even the Police are investigating them. The Devolved government in Scotland needs to go now
attributes.background: SCOTISH GOVERNMENT ARE WASTING TOO MUCH OF BRITISH TAX PAYERS MONEY AND NOT BEING TRANSPARENT ON WHAT THEY SPEND IT ON

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision on whether or not devolution should continue is a matter for people of Scotland, not the UK Government or Parliament.
